metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0488 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: ARM mbed TLS before 1.3.22, before 2.1.10, and before 2.7.0, when thetruncated HMAC extension and CBC are used, allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap corruption) via acrafted application packet within a TLS or DTLS session.

criterions.comment: polarssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
